andromeda.why: Claims stewardship without capture—sovereign resource holding.

arcturus.why: Sets basic treasury container: ledgers, cadence, and scope.

draco.why: Guards thresholds to the storehouse; checks freeload/predation.

lyra.why: Simple ritual of gathering makes ownership legible.

orion-dark.why: Early possessiveness risks control optics over commons.

orion-light.why: Discipline to steward rather than hoard the resources.

pleiades.why: Welcoming distribution bonds the tribe around sufficiency.

sirius.why: Foundational setup, not yet an explicit teaching.

andromeda.why: Affirms consent-based tithe/exchange—no surrender of agency.

arcturus.why: Places roles, pacing, and clear terms for collection/redistribution.

draco.why: Sentinel for fair access and loyalty to the pact.

lyra.why: Plain ceremony (‘market day’) clarifies the exchange.

orion-dark.why: Tradition can be used to compel tribute over truth.

orion-light.why: Keeps integrity in taking and giving back.

pleiades.why: Attuned redistribution nourishes safety and belonging.

sirius.why: Competent stewardship without formal instruction yet.

andromeda.why: Dependency loops or patronage outsource agency.

arcturus.why: Misplaced budgets and timing—container of wealth wobbles.

lyra.why: Optics of wealth/display eclipse true provision.

orion-dark.why: Coercive taxation/ownership doctrine enforced by rank.

orion-light.why: Lesson: audit, reset scope, and repair trust.

pleiades.why: Appeasement gifts create enmeshment, not care.

sirius.why: No stable pedagogy—trial-and-error in resource handling.

andromeda.why: Ends exploitative tolls; asserts fair access to the commons.

draco.why: Anti-fraud thresholding; loyalty to shared rules.

orion-dark.why: Policy can ossify into resource dogma.

pleiades.why: Hospitality in distribution calms scarcity nerves.

sirius.why: Teaches resource protocol—ledger, audit, and release cadence.

andromeda.why: Uses influence to free the tribe from predatory taxation/control.

arcturus.why: Sets standards for ownership, tithe, and redistribution.

draco.why: Enforces loyalty to the commons and fair access.

lyra.why: Cultural rites of distribution unify identity.

orion-dark.why: Projection risk: monarchic orthodoxy over living needs.

pleiades.why: Mentoring warmth ensures the vulnerable are covered.

sirius.why: Instruction in stewardship law—treasury as royal curriculum.

andromeda.why: Embodied sovereign ensures the commons serves freedom.

arcturus.why: Establishes enduring canon for resource governance.

draco.why: Presence can feel like a gate to ‘real’ resources.

lyra.why: Archetypal sovereign tone—plain rites, high dignity.

orion-light.why: Courage to allocate, abdicate, or withhold by truth.

sirius.why: Royal instruction: resource canon transmitted by presence/protocol.
